snippet.title: CLICKERTALE 3 - Cinematic Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The game releases in the exact moment when the trailer premieres!
A cinematic trailer of Clickertale 3 - A bullet hell RPG clicker. 

Join Clickertale Discord: https://discord.gg/6fbfuCF

Download Clickertale 3: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale3/528743
Download Clickertale 2: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale2/249516
Download Clickertale 1: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickertale-undertale-clicker/133393
Download Clickerrune: https://gamejolt.com/games/clickerrune/377434

Thank you The Gravity Breaker for creating art in this video!
The Gravity Breaker: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdyAv8IjA9WlDOZX2V_ZVA

Clickertale 3 is the sequel to the Clickertale series, an Undertale fangame in which Chara and their allies must defeat an entity known as ClickGaster who's main goal is to destroy their universe following the unintended destruction of his own.

Clickertale 3 will bring to you new story, characters, mechanics, enemies, and bosses while reducing the original 'clicker game' gameplay mechanic, leaving you with a new world to explore following the events in the Void of Clickertale 2.
